General.Name: Blue Cap AG
General.Description: Blue Cap AG, an investment company, acquires and supports small and medium enterprises. The company operates in the Adhesives & Coatings, Plastics, Business Services, Medical, and Others segments. It considers investments in niche companies of all industry sectors with particular interest in business services, production companies, language service provider / translation agency (business-to-business), technology orientated companies. The company prefers to invests in Germany, Austria and Switzerland. Blue Cap AG was founded in 2006 and is based in Munich, Germany.

0.Name: Mr. Tobias  Hoffmann-Becking
0.Title: CEO & Chairman of the Management Board
